content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 852020 the defendant initially refused to pay the plaintiffs costs but the supreme court ruled that they must compensate the plaintiff the case involves the distribution of goods including a flat household appliances and a car the applicant is entitled to 70 of the division of funds while the defendant is entitled to 30 the supreme court dismissed the application for revision the specific laws mentioned are the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court has determined the ownership and respective shares of the coowned property with the applicant having a 70 share and the defendant having a 30 share the court of appeal has allowed the applicants appeal and amended the judgment of the court of first instance the defendant is seeking permission to appeal the judgment and has raised questions regarding the calculation of shares and the fairness of the assessment the court of appeal determined that the applicant has a greater share in the coowned property based on their contribution to the household and childcare responsibilities the supreme court dismissed the application for review but unanimously adopted the decision

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 85/2020, 2. 6. 2021
